about_the_game:
Allied Speeches Pack

Monumental and inspirational moments from history come alive in your Hearts of Iron IV game with the Allied Speech Pack. Set to activate when certain in-game conditions are met, the Allied Speech Pack brings you closer to the past.

  • Over 70 minutes of speech taken from the darkest days of the last century.
  • 13 total speech excerpts
  • “Peace in our time” declares Neville Chamberlain, as he sells out Czechoslovakia in favor of a temporary peace.
  • “We shall fight on beaches” proclaims Winston Churchill, demonstrating the iron resolve that will get Great Britain through its darkest hour.
  • “I have returned” declares Douglas MacArthur, the titan of America’s army in the Pacific.
  • And 10 more speeches from leaders of the Allied nations.
